item.title: By: vmjustis
item.dc:creator: vmjustis
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/shop/sunnyvale/#comment-2746">jack.oxton</a>.
This was my first flavor and I haven't changed flavors since, really love the taste!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to jack.oxton.

This was my first flavor and I haven’t changed flavors since, really love the taste!

item.title: By: jack.oxton
item.dc:creator: jack.oxton
item.description: Really, really good. Smooth, well rounded flavors really compliment each other very well. The only thing that would have made it 5 stars for me is a bit less lemon flavor (slightly overpowers the kiwi and dragon fruit imo), but that's just my opinion!
item.content:encoded: Really, really good. Smooth, well rounded flavors really compliment each other very well. The only thing that would have made it 5 stars for me is a bit less lemon flavor (slightly overpowers the kiwi and dragon fruit imo), but that’s just my opinion!
